description: Layering rules are documented in PRD and referenced by this plan.
@alga-psa/shared typechecks and builds with the new billingClients module.
@alga-psa/billing typechecks and builds with no imports from @alga-psa/clients.
@alga-psa/clients typechecks and builds with no imports from @alga-psa/billing.
No dynamic import helpers remain that exist solely to avoid billing↔clients static dependency detection.
Dependency graph is validated via import-greps and TypeScript file inclusion (nx graph optional).
Build/typecheck “smoke checks” pass for shared, billing, and clients.
@alga-psa/auth typechecks after refactor (no test-only type errors during package typecheck).
@alga-psa/ui typechecks and has no imports from vertical slices (verify via grep + typecheck).
nx build run-many succeeds without circular dependency errors.
